workLog.action: Checked for open issues with labels: improvement, community-contribution (none found)
Fixed review-improvements procedure to not rely on non-existent labels; added gh CLI search fallbacks.
Enhanced review-improvements procedure: show up to 10 issues, add Next page + Deduplicate by title options.
Returned to meta-mode menu after releasing v0.7.4
Fixed state detection to treat scaffolding-only Mother Brain init folders as new projects (avoid false onboarding). Updated state-detection.md + SKILL.md Step 2 wording.
